attributes.action: bring into force regular random compulsory drugs testing for all Westminster staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Armed forces and certain other security force elements are subject to Compulsory Drugs Testing (CDT).  However members of parliment and civil servants are not.  If the responsibility of bearing arms requires CDT, the responsibility of running the country should too.  Those found to be in contravention should be discharged and barred from employment.
